title: Frostbound Throne: Song of Winter
description: They’ve escaped the destruction of the Court of Night, only to find greater perils awaiting them.  A demon has long watched in the shadows, biding his time. Now he’s ready to strike, and the likelihood that Devi and Vale can stop him is close to nil.  There is only one hope… Court of Sin isn’t suitable for sensitive readers.
author: May Sage
